apiKeyNotFoundMessage: Please set your API_KEY environment variable to use the AI Code Mentor.
guestModeMessage: You are in guest mode. <1>Login</1> to save your progress.

chat.title: AI Mentor Chat
chat.sendError: Failed to send message. The AI may be busy or there could be a network issue. Please try again shortly.

notes.title: My Notes
notes.disabled: Notes are available in Learning Path mode.
notes.selectLesson: Select a lesson to start taking notes.

settings.customDocsDescription: Add URLs to documentation for the AI to potentially reference. (Note: This is a foundational feature for future targeted lookups).

newProjectModal.title: Create a New Project
newProjectModal.description: Describe your project goal, and the AI Mentor will guide you from there.
newProjectModal.projectGoal: What do you want to build?
newProjectModal.projectGoalPlaceholder: e.g., A simple website to showcase my design work, built with React and Tailwind CSS.
newProjectModal.initialBotMessage: Hello! I can help you set up a new project. First, what is the name of your project and what is its main goal?
newProjectModal.confirmMessage: I've understood your requirements. Here is the file structure I will generate. Does this look correct?

createPathModal.title: Create a Personalized Learning Path
createPathModal.initialBotMessage: Hello! I can create a custom learning path for you. What is your ultimate learning goal? For example: 'Become a backend developer' or 'Learn to build interactive web maps'.
createPathModal.confirmMessage: Here is the learning path I've designed for you. Does this look right?

deleteProjectModal.title: Delete Project
deleteProjectModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{projectName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

deletePathModal.title: Delete Learning Path
deletePathModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the learning path "{{pathName}}"? All your learning progress and data in this path will be permanently lost. This action cannot be undone.
deletePathModal.warning: Warning: Deleting this path cannot be recovered!

clearHistoryModal.title: Clear Chat History
clearHistoryModal.message: Are you sure you want to clear the entire chat history for this session? This action cannot be undone.

deleteNodeModal.title: Delete Item
deleteNodeModal.messageFile: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the file "{{nodeName}}"?
deleteNodeModal.messageFolder: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the folder "{{nodeName}}" and all of its contents? This action cannot be undone.

codeEditor.selectFile: Select a file to start editing.
codeEditor.emptyProject: Your project is empty. Create a file or folder to begin.
